actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive payment of premiums on term life insurance during the continuance of certain disabilities beginning after the insured's sixty-fifth birthday.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, for five-year level premium term insurance, to waive the payment of premiums on National Service Life Insurance during a continuous disability beginning after the insured's 65th birthday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive payment of premiums on term life insurance during the continuance of certain disabilities beginning after the insured's sixty-fifth birthday.
